author: byersa
msg: I found that views the put a prefix on from/thruDate do not work with the simple language "filter-by-date" option.
Rather than mess with the code, I just added an alias for those two fields to ContentAssocViewFrom/To.

author: ningjiang
msg: Reopened the HTTPS 401 Redirect test and the Default sequential Strategy test

author: jacopoc
msg: As a temp fix, I've reverted the change I did in rev. 540479, because it was causing problems during order checkout under some special circumstances.
Now the processOrderPayments service is triggered only when updateOrderItems and appendOrderItem are run (as it was before rev. 540479).
I will return on this as soon as I have some time.
